messages.content: book my metting tomorrow  in 10 pm
I'd be happy to help you book an appointment! What type of service would you like? (consultation, therapy, workshop, meeting, etc.)
Great! I can help you book a meeting. Let me check available slots for tomorrow at 10 AM.
Before we confirm your booking, could you please provide your email address for confirmation?
That doesn't look like a valid email address. Please enter a valid email (e.g., user@example.com):
Thank you! I've saved your email as pradeepsahnai@gmail.com. Let's confirm your booking.

✅ Perfect! I've confirmed your meeting for Tomorrow at 10:00 AM. Confirmation email sent successfully!

**Booking Details:**
• Confirmation #: CNF-20250628-9165
• Location: Main Office - Conference Room A
• Duration: 60 minutes

Is there anything else I can help you with?
Thank you! If you need to book another appointment or have any questions, just let me know. Have a great day! 😊
